attributes.action: make it mandatory for shops to publicise all decisions to stop selling a specific item
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Time and again I go into a shop, such as a shoe shop, which sells a specific style of shoe I like; only to be told that this particular style has been discontinued.  Of course I accept the right of any shop to make such a decision but if I knew this was going to happen I could stock up on the shoes (or whatever) before they stopped selling them; this would, presumably, also benefit the shop in that they would (obviously) sell more.  I'm sure I can't be the only person to experience this frequent  frustration.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
